001package edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.hilt;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import com.google.gson.Gson;
005import com.google.gson.GsonBuilder;
006import dagger.Module;
007import dagger.Provides;
008import dagger.hilt.InstallIn;
009import dagger.hilt.android.qualifiers.ApplicationContext;
010import dagger.hilt.components.SingletonComponent;
011import edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.R;
012import edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.service.UnoServiceLongProxy;
013import edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.service.UnoServiceProxy;
014import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
015import javax.inject.Singleton;
016import okhttp3.OkHttpClient;
017import okhttp3.logging.HttpLoggingInterceptor;
018import okhttp3.logging.HttpLoggingInterceptor.Level;
019import retrofit2.Retrofit;
020import retrofit2.adapter.rxjava3.RxJava3CallAdapterFactory;
021import retrofit2.converter.gson.GsonConverterFactory;
022
023/**
024 * Module for providing UnoService dependencies using Hilt.
025 */
026@Module
027@InstallIn(SingletonComponent.class)
028public class UnoServiceModule {
029
030  /**
031   * Default initialization constructor for the {@code UnoServiceModule}
032   */
033  UnoServiceModule() {
034
035  }
036
037  /**
038   * Provides an UnoServiceProxy as a singleton using Hilt/Dagger dependency injection.
039   *
040   * <p>
041   * This method initializes the app's GSON serializer, OkHttp web client, and provides them for the
042   * creation of a Retrofit object.
043   * </p>
044   *
045   * @param context the app's ApplicationContext.
046   * @return UnoServiceProxy.
047   */
048  @Provides
049  @Singleton
050  public UnoServiceProxy provideProxy(@ApplicationContext Context context) {
051    Gson gson = new GsonBuilder()
052        .excludeFieldsWithoutExposeAnnotation()
053        .create();
054    String loggingLevelProperty = context.getString(R.string.logging_level).toUpperCase();
055    Level loggingLevel = Level.valueOf(loggingLevelProperty);
056    HttpLoggingInterceptor logging = new HttpLoggingInterceptor();
057    logging.setLevel(loggingLevel);
058
059    OkHttpClient client = new OkHttpClient.Builder()
060        .addInterceptor(logging)
061        .build();
062
063    Retrofit retrofit = new Retrofit.Builder()
064        .client(client)
065        .baseUrl(context.getString(R.string.base_url))
066        .addConverterFactory(GsonConverterFactory.create(gson))
067        .addCallAdapterFactory(RxJava3CallAdapterFactory.create())
068        .build();
069
070    return retrofit.create(UnoServiceProxy.class);
071  }
072
073  /**
074   * Provides an UnoServiceLongProxy as a singleton using Hilt/Dagger dependency injection.
075   *
076   * <p>
077   * This method initializes the app's GSON serializer, OkHttp web client, and provides them for the
078   * creation of a Retrofit object. This proxy is responsible only for long polling in the
079   * application.
080   * </p>
081   *
082   * @param context the app's ApplicationContext.
083   * @return UnoServiceProxy.
084   */
085  @Provides
086  @Singleton
087  public UnoServiceLongProxy provideLongProxy(@ApplicationContext Context context) {
088    Gson gson = new GsonBuilder()
089        .excludeFieldsWithoutExposeAnnotation()
090        .create();
091    String loggingLevelProperty = context.getString(R.string.logging_level).toUpperCase();
092    Level loggingLevel = Level.valueOf(loggingLevelProperty);
093    HttpLoggingInterceptor logging = new HttpLoggingInterceptor();
094    logging.setLevel(loggingLevel);
095
096    OkHttpClient client = new OkHttpClient.Builder()
097        .addInterceptor(logging)
098        .connectTimeout(0, TimeUnit.SECONDS)
099        .writeTimeout(0, TimeUnit.SECONDS)
100        .readTimeout(0, TimeUnit.SECONDS)
101        .callTimeout(15, TimeUnit.SECONDS)
102        .build();
103
104    Retrofit retrofit = new Retrofit.Builder()
105        .client(client)
106        .baseUrl(context.getString(R.string.base_url))
107        .addConverterFactory(GsonConverterFactory.create(gson))
108        .addCallAdapterFactory(RxJava3CallAdapterFactory.create())
109        .build();
110
111    return retrofit.create(UnoServiceLongProxy.class);
112  }
113
114
115}
